Text: Southern Sierra Miwok:  Southern Sierra Miwok is a member of the Miwok language family along with Lake Miwok, Coast Miwok (extinct), Saclan (extinct), Plains Miwok (extinct), Northern Sierra Miwok and Central Sierra Miwok.

Text: Southern Sierra Miwok:  The Southern Sierra Miwok language is nearly extinct with only a few speakers existing today.
